plugin.name: l33t Aarchaeology Reporter
plugin.author: Ruhamah
plugin.description: Report which Aarchaeology item numbers you are missing.

plugin.name: l33t Bandit
plugin.author: Ruhamah
plugin.description: l33t Bandit tracks fence values and shady thievery things.

plugin.name: l33t Beacons
plugin.author: Ruhamah
plugin.description: Saves rooms to keywords to enable fast recall using those keywords.

plugin.name: l33t Bin
plugin.author: Ruhamah
plugin.description: Shares selected text to l33t bin (similar to mudbin, pastebin, hastebin).

plugin.name: l33t Butler
plugin.author: Ruhamah
plugin.description: l33t Butler keeps rooms tidy for you!

plugin.name: l33t Doorman
plugin.author: Ruhamah
plugin.description: l33t Doorman opens doors for you!

plugin.name: l33t Hunt Trick
plugin.author: Ruhamah
plugin.description: l33t Hunt Trick and Hunt helpers

plugin.name: l33t Enchanter
plugin.author: Ruhamah
plugin.description: l33t Enchanter batch enchants items in containers.

plugin.name: l33t Room Announcer
plugin.author: Ruhamah
plugin.description: l33t Room Announcer sets custom announcements when entering rooms.

plugin.name: l33t Stopwatch
plugin.author: Ruhamah
plugin.description: Tracks your leveling up, power up, or campaign speed.

plugin.name: l33t Lua Utils
plugin.author: Ruhamah
plugin.description: l33t Lua utils. A dependency of other l33t plugins. Handles GMCP and broadcasts metadata.

plugin.name: Aardwolf Fake Tracker Channel by Mendaloth
plugin.author: Mendaloth
plugin.description: Allows use of a fake tracker channel, along with history.

plugin.name: Aardwolf Instinct/Mastery Reporter by Mendaloth
plugin.author: Mendaloth
plugin.description: Reports your instinct and mastery to room or a channel.

plugin.name: Group Inviter by Pwar
plugin.author: Pwar
plugin.description: Lets you add friends/clan members to a list to auto-invite them to party when they login. Also lets group members use commands via tell/group messages to invite themselves or others.
